name: Awaken Earth: ForestHack
description:
Awaken Earth: ForestHack is a classical roguelike. 

It is on pre-alpha state, and all art is placeholder.

Features on this release:

  • Simple dungeon generation, with 5 working levels and enemies, and combat system
  • Leveling up of player, hunger, death

Known issues:

  • Not a way to restore hunger
  • Not informing the player when hunger starts dealing damage
  • It's only possible to go down a ladder, not up.
  • Only 5 dungeon levels are working. From the 6th dungeon level on the enemies won't be properly generated.

Features for release 0.0.2 - Overworld, planned for 16/11/2019:

  • Overworld forest
  • New enemies
  • A little UI overhaul
  • Better pathfinding algorithm

Future Roadmap:

Alpha:

  • 0.0.3 - Equipment, Food, and Locked Doors
  • 0.0.4 - Treasure, Drops, and Item Spawn
  • 0.0.5 - Saving, Character Creation, and Quality of Life
  • 0.0.6 - Potions, Magical, and Cyber Items
  • 0.0.7 - New Depths (improved dungeon generation, new monsters and levels)
  • 0.0.8 - Monstrous Update (monsters' special attacks and moves)
  • 0.0.9 - NPCs, Dialogues, and Merchants

Beta:

  • 0.1 - Graphics Overhaul
  • 0.2 - Big Lore Overhaul

The game will be released as Early Access on Steam on the first quarter of 2020.
